title: AEP Lakehouse Batch Errors
description: Global schema for AEP Lakehouse datasets containing batch errors for diagnostics.

xdm:datasetID.title: DatasetID
xdm:datasetID.description: Dataset Id the batch was created for.

xdm:batchID.title: BatchID
xdm:batchID.description: Id for the batch containing the input files.

xdm:path.title: Path
xdm:path.description: Path to the input file that contained this record.

xdm:record.title: Record
xdm:record.description: JSON encoded record that failed to process.

xdm:corruptRecord.title: CorruptRecord
xdm:corruptRecord.description: Original record that failed to process

xdm:errors.title: Errors
xdm:errors.description: Array of errors that caused this record to fail.

xdm:column.title: Column
xdm:column.description: The column that caused the error.

xdm:message.title: Message
xdm:message.description: Human readable message for the error.
